How to test:

1. Run the application.
2. Execute 'curl xxclientid:xx1981@localhost:8080/oauth/token -d grant_type=password -d username=admin -d password=abc123'
3. Get the access_token.
4. Execute curl http://localhost:8080/api/v1/<resource> -H "Authorization: Bearer <access_token here>"

e.g.
curl http://localhost:8080/api/v1/users -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..wm5XON2CYwKAiCs2V5HjrZNRDwPMBSFINUP2MPSw8qo"
